project.name: Fellow API
project.description: Fellow API documentation for Bevry's Fellow Package

Fellow.name: Fellow
Fellow.description: A fellow with similarties to other people

classitems.description: Create a new Fellow instance with the value, however if the value is already a fellow instance, then just return it
classitems.name: create

classitems.description: A singleton array attached to the class object that stores it's people objects
classitems.name: list

classitems.description: An array of fields that will denote if the user is the same user or not when using ensure
classitems.name: ensureFields

classitems.description: With the value, see if an existing fellow exists in our singleton list property with the value, otherwise create a new fellow instance with the value and add them to our singleton list
classitems.name: ensure

params.name: value
params.description: The value to create a new fellow instance or find the existing fellow instance with

return.description: The new or existing fellow instance

classitems.description: Get a fellow from the singleton list
classitems.name: get

params.name: value
params.description: The value to fetch the value with

return.description: The fetched fellow, if they exist with that value

classitems.description: Add a fellow or a series of people, denoted by the value, to the singleton list
classitems.name: add

params.name: value
params.description: The fellow or people to add

return.description: An array of the fellow objects for the passed people

classitems.description:
If the name is prefixed with a series of numbers, that is considered the year
E.g. In `2015+ Bevry Pty Ltd` then `2015+` is the years
E.g. In `2013-2015 Bevry Pty Ltd` then `2013-2015` is the years
classitems.name: years

classitems.description:
If this is a github URL, then `githubUrl` and `githubUsername` are extracted and this is not yet
If this is not a github URL, then it is set to `homepage`
When fetched, it will return `homepage || githubUrl || null`
classitems.name: url

classitems.description: Construct our fellow instance with the value
classitems.name: value The value used to set the properties of the fellow, forwarded to setValue

classitems.description: Update our fellow with the passed value
classitems.name: fellow A string in the format of "Benjamin Lupton <b@lupton.cc> (https://balupton.com)" or an object with properties

classitems.description: Ensures that the github repository exists on the class
classitems.name: ensureGithubRepository

classitems.description: Get all added github repository slugs that this fellow contributes to
classitems.name: contributedGithubRepositories

classitems.description: Make note that this fellow contributes to this repository slug
classitems.name: contributesToGithubRepository

params.name: slug
params.description: The github repository slug that this user contributes to

classitems.description: Get all added github repository slugs that this fellow maintains
classitems.name: maintainedGithubRepositories

classitems.description: Make note that this fellow maintains this repository slug
classitems.name: maintainsGithubRepository

params.name: slug
params.description: The github repository slug that this user maintains

classitems.description: Get all added github repository slugs that this fellow authors
classitems.name: authoredGithubRepositories

classitems.description: Make note that this fellow authors this repository slug
classitems.name: authorsGithubRepository

params.name: slug
params.description: The github repository slug that this user authors
